title: Full Day Nazca Lines, Huacachina Oasis with Buggy and Sandboard
description: See two of Peru’s more off-the-beaten-path attractions during this full-day excursion from Lima. Alongside your guide and group, make the long journey to the Nazca Lines, large pictographs that have been drawn in the Peruvian desert. Then, head to the Huacachina desert oasis where you can enjoy activities like sandboarding and a dune buggy ride.
all_descriptions: See two of Peru’s more off-the-beaten-path attractions during this full-day excursion from Lima. Alongside your guide and group, make the long journey to the Nazca Lines, large pictographs that have been drawn in the Peruvian desert. Then, head to the Huacachina desert oasis where you can enjoy activities like sandboarding and a dune buggy ride.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Lima, Lima, Lima RegionWe observe around 25 to 30 lines drawn in the Peruvian desert, 4:00 AM – Departure from Lima
Start your adventure early. Leave Lima in a comfortable vehicle heading south. The trip will be long, but it is worth it for what awaits you.
11:00 AM – Arrival in Nazca
You will arrive in Nazca after about four hours of travel. Take some time to stretch your legs and enjoy a revitalizing breakfast at a local restaurant.oubtedly a mystical place.Duration: 7 hoursStop At:Nazca, Nazca, Ica Region11:30 AM – Check in at the airfield for the Nazca Lines Overflight
Head to the airfield for an exciting flyover over the enigmatic Nazca Lines. From the sky, you'll have stunning views of the geometric figures and animals that have intrigued researchers for decades (duration 35 minutes).
IMPORTANT:
The overflight may take between 30 minutes to 1 hour due to bad weather or other logistical situations that are out of our hands, therefore I ask for your understanding and patience.
1:30 PM – Lunch in Nazca
Recharge with lunch at a local restaurant in Nazca (Not Included). Try delicious Peruvian cuisine for an authentic culinary experience.Duration: 2 hoursStop At:Ica, Ica, Ica Region2:30 PM – Trip to Huacachina
Start the journey to the oasis of Huacachina. Enjoy the changing views as you venture into the desert landscape.
4:30 PM – Arrival in Huacachina
When you arrive at the Huacachina oasis, you will be surprised by the beauty of this small paradise surrounded by high sand dunes.Duration: 3 hoursStop At:Huacachina Oasis, Huacachina 11000 Peru5:00 PM – Buggy and Sandboarding Adventure
Hop aboard a dune buggy for an exciting tour of the dunes. Then, she feels the adrenaline rush as you sandboard the steep sand slopes.
6:00 PM – Sunset in Huacachina
Get ready to witness an unforgettable sunset. The dunes and oasis are illuminated with warm colors as the sun sets on the horizon.
7:00 PM – Return to LimaDuration: 2 hoursStop At:Lima, Lima, Lima Region7:00 PM – Return to Lima
After a day full of emotions, the trip back to Lima begins. You can take the opportunity to rest along the way or reflect on the day's experiences.
Final tips:
Book flights over the Nazca Lines and activities in Huacachina in advance.
Bring comfortable clothing, sunglasses, sunscreen and water.
Stay hydrated throughout the day, especially in the desert.
Make sure you have enough battery in your camera to capture memorable moments.
This itinerary will allow you to explore two of the most amazing destinations in Peru in one exciting day. From the enigmatic Nazca Lines to the relaxing oasis of Huacachina, this experience promises to be unforgettable. Enjoy every moment of this unique adventure!Duration: 4 hours

Great solo trip Nazca and Huacachina

Oct 2025 • Solo
Great Solo Trip . Very long but worth it if you want to get the most out of your time. 4am to 11pm . Did the huacachina and nazca lines . Both a truly beautiful and amazing experience. Frendy , our guide , was amazing. Her extensive knowledge of the history and passion for her culture was contagious. Very organized. Highly recommended
Written October 1, 2025

Sydney, Australia15 contributions

Great way to see Nazca Lines and top up with exceptional fun in Oasis.

Sep 2025 • Couples
We had a fantastic time in this long day tour. It started early but it’s all worthwhile.
The Nazca Lines are amazing and it’s a must see, the pilots are really good in navigating the plane to give us great vantage points for sightings.
The afternoon was filled with fun with the sand buggy ride and sand-boarding.
Our tour guide Sonia are excellent in showing us the sites and making sure our jam packed day went smoothly. Our driver Javier was just equally good!
Full marks for this tour and highly recommended.
Written September 28, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

If you can take the time to stay back and on the road, we highly recommend the two guides responsible for the tour arrangement.

Due to the length of the route to NASCA, each by two guides, Louis is responsible for the arrangement and transfer of the journey, Revilla is responsible for the local explanation and guidance of the journey, the overall is very complete, the prior reminders and notifications are also done in detail, so that we have a very complete experience, NASCA flight although only half an hour but very amazing, buggy ride like a rainbow is very exciting, if you can withstand the time to stay back and on the road, I highly recommend these two guides responsible for the schedule.

Highly recommended!

Sep 2025 • Couples
Everything was perfect. Our guide, Frendy, was very insightful, full of information and helpful tips when needed. Both activities were great, Nasca lines is a step on history and Huacachina extremely fun!
Having a driver like Luis Alcarraz gave us peace of mind, the trip is long and he was alert and careful all the way.
Written September 13, 2025

Inca Trilogy Tours

Frendy will be happy to know his knowledge and tips added value to your day, and Luis will surely appreciate your kind words about his safe driving.

reviews.title: Sand and historic lines,  epic
reviews.text: Amazing experience,  Davi and Frendy were excellent guides, friendly and knowledgeable and answered all my questions expertly. Amazing day, would recommend!

reviews.title: Best day in Nazca Huacachina
reviews.text: The sightseeing flight to see over 10 Geogryphs in Nazca and the buggy sandboarding experience in the dunes of Huacachina were great fun! My guide, Freddy, was also very courteous and gave me a detailed explanation of the history of the ruins!The bus on the move had softer chairs than I'd imagined, and I could recline and sleep comfortably.

reviews.title: Good experience
reviews.text: He explained in great detail, care and detail about the Nazca ground drawings and so on. I also think he was very kind.
